nodes.text: Nixor was a planet located in the Mid Rim, coreward of Hutt Space. It was the homeworld of the Nixor species.
During the Great Sith War, Krath came from Attahox and conquered the planet, from which they moved to Daalang.

During the early years of the New Order, Nixor was known as a place for an independent starship captain to hide from the Galactic Empire. However, the spaceports on Nixor were poorly maintained, primarily because the Nixor people wanted nothing to do with either the Old Republic or Empire and their regulations. Thus, although it was a good place to hide, Nixor offered nothing in the way of amenities or starship services.
